articles.author: Sandee LaMotte, CNN
articles.title: Makeup may contain potentially toxic chemicals, study finds
articles.description: The "No PFAS in Cosmetics Act" will be introduced in the US House and Senate on Tuesday following the release of a new study that found high levels of a marker for toxic PFAS substances in 52% of 231 makeup products purchased in the United States and Canada.
articles.content:
By Sandee LaMotte, CNN
Updated 6:27 AM ET, Tue June 15, 2021
 (CNN)The "No PFAS in Cosmetics Act" will be introduced in the US House and Senate on Tuesday following the release of a new study that … [+11914 chars]

articles.title: 'Sometimes we get forgotten about'

articles.title: Our racial equity commitments, one year later

articles.author: Brad Brooks
articles.title: Native Americans decry unmarked graves, untold history of boarding schools - Reuters
articles.description: Clarence Smith was fresh off a 24-hour bus trip from his Blackfeet reservation in Montana to the Flandreau Indian School in South Dakota in the late 1980s, where he was sent by his family in the hope he would receive a better education.
